title: 10/07/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/07/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to MLB Network Analyst and World Series Champion Mike Lowell about a breakdown of the Red Sox relay play that he did on the network yesterday. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo calls in to discuss why he thinks the Seahawks are a fluke. Chris "Mad Dog" Russo explains why he doesn't think the Astros cheated their way to a title in 2017. And the voice of the Dodgers Charley Steiner discusses his call of the Chris Taylor walk-off last night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to MLB Network Analyst and World Series Champion Mike Lowell about a breakdown of the Red Sox relay play that he did on the network yesterday. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo calls in to discuss why he thinks the Seahawks are a fluke. Chris "Mad Dog" Russo explains why he doesn't think the Astros cheated their way to a title in 2017. And the voice of the Dodgers Charley Steiner discusses his call of the Chris Taylor walk-off last night.
